title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: tempera on silk
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave
description: White moire with stripes of yellow, rose and black. Between the stripes are painted groups of musical trophies. Small flowering vine border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: tempera on silk
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave. Gift of Jacob H. Schiff. 1906-21-12.
